description:
Momo finally meets Ryoko. Later, the accident-prone Yuko must carry a FRAGILE and VALUABLE laptop home with her. What could possibly go wrong?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: A Town Full of Traps?? The Demon on the Brink Awakens a New Ability
Chounai wa Wana Darake?? Gakebbuchi Mazoku no Aratanaru Nouryoku
町内は罠だらけ?? 崖っぷちまぞくの新たなる能力
마을 안은 함정투성이!? 궁지에 몰린 마족의 새로운 능력
